'''Ilyin''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the World Quest [[Where the Dandelions Find Rest]]. He is killed by [[Traveler]] during this quest. Although he has the appearance of a [[Fatui Skirmisher - Pyroslinger Bracer]], he turns into the appearance of a [[Fatui Pyro Agent]] when fighting.
